info.title: Azure File Storage
info.description: Microsoft Azure Storage provides a massively scalable, durable, and highly available storage for data on the cloud, and serves as the data storage solution for modern applications. Connect to File Storage to perform various operations such as create, update, get and delete on files in your Azure Storage account.

get.description: This operation retrieves file metadata using file id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to get metadata

put.description: This operation updates a file in Azure File Storage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specify the content to update the file with

parameters.name: ReadFileMetadataFromServer
parameters.description: Get all file metadata from the SFTP server after file creation is complete. If this is false, some metadata properties may not be returned such as last modified time, etc.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to delete

parameters.name: SkipDeleteIfFileNotFoundOnServer
parameters.description: Skips the deletion if a file is not found on the server.

patch.description: This operation appends to a file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to append to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specify the content to append to the file

parameters.name: ReadFileMetadataFromServer
parameters.description: Get all file metadata from the SFTP server after file creation is complete. If this is false, some metadata properties may not be returned such as last modified time, etc.

get.description: This operation retrieves file metadata using path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Specify unique path to the file

get.description: This operation retrieves file contents using path

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Specify unique path to the file

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: Infer content-type based on extension

get.description: This operation retrieves file contents using id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to get contents

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: Infer content-type based on extension

post.description: This operation uploads a file to Azure File Storage.

parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.description: Specify folder path to upload

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify name of the file to create

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specify content of the file to upload

parameters.name: ReadFileMetadataFromServer
parameters.description: Get all file metadata from the SFTP server after file creation is complete. If this is false, some metadata properties may not be returned such as last modified time, etc.

parameters.name: ReadFileMetadataFromServer
parameters.description: Get all file metadata from the SFTP server after file creation is complete. If this is false, some metadata properties may not be returned such as last modified time, etc.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Specify the Url to source file

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Specify the destination file path, including target filename

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Should the destination file be overwritten (true/false)?

parameters.name: ReadFileMetadataFromServer
parameters.description: Get all file metadata from the SFTP server after file creation is complete. If this is false, some metadata properties may not be returned such as last modified time, etc.

get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a file is added in a directory.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Select a directory

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: Infer content-type based on extension

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add a file in the directory you selected.

get.summary: When a file is added or modified
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a file is added or modified in a directory.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Select a directory

parameters.name: includeFileContent
parameters.description: If set to true, file content will also be retrieved along with the trigger response

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: Infer content-type based on extension

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it works now, add or change a file in the directory you selected.

parameters.name: maxFileCount
parameters.description: Maximum number of files to return by single trigger run (1-100). Note that 'Split On' setting can force trigger to process each item individually.

get.summary: When a file is added or modified (properties only)
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when one or more files are added or modified in a directory.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Select a directory

parameters.name: maxFileCount
parameters.description: Maximum number of files to return by single trigger run (1-100). Note that 'Split On' setting can force trigger to process each item individually.

parameters.name: checkBothCreatedAndModifiedDateTime
parameters.description: If the flag is set to true, the trigger will check the file's created date and time and the file's last modified date and time. If the flag is set to false, the trigger will only check the file's last modified date and time.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add or change files in the directory you selected.

get.description: This operation lists files in a directory.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the folder to list contents

get.description: This operation lists files in a folder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the folder

parameters.name: useFlatListing
parameters.description: Whether or not to list files in flat listing

get.description: This operation lists files in the Azure File Storage root folder.

post.description: This operation extracts an archive file into a folder (example: .zip).

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Specify the path to the archive file

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Specify the path in Azure File Storage to extract the archive contents

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Should destination file be overwritten (true/false)?

Id.description: The unique id of the file or folder.

Name.description: The name of the file or folder.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the file or folder.

Path.description: The path of the file or folder.

LastModified.description: The date and time the file or folder was last modified.

Size.description: The size of the file or folder.

MediaType.description: The media type of the file or folder.

IsFolder.description: A boolean value (true, false) to indicate whether or not the blob is a folder.

ETag.description: The etag of the file or folder.

FileLocator.description: The filelocator of the file or folder.

Id.description: The unique id of the file or folder.

Name.description: The name of the file or folder.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the file or folder.

Path.description: The path of the file or folder.

LastModified.description: The date and time the file or folder was last modified.

Size.description: The size of the file or folder.

MediaType.description: The media type of the file or folder.

IsFolder.description: A boolean value (true, false) to indicate whether or not the blob is a folder.

ETag.description: The etag of the file or folder.

FileLocator.description: The filelocator of the file or folder.

BlobMetadataPage.description: Represents a page of blob metadata.
